mapper.insert: MERGE INTO stock_table s USING ( SELECT p.product, p.standard, p.purchase_price, p.purchase_EAprice, SUM(p.pur_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Purchase_table p WHERE p.purchase_date = (SELECT MAX(purchase_date) FROM Purchase_table) GROUP BY p.product, p.standard, purchase_price, p.purchase_EAprice ) p ON (s.purchase_EAprice = p.purchase_EAprice AND s.product = p.product AND s.standard = p.standard) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET s.quantity = s.quantity + p.total_quantity WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (STANDARD, PURCHASE_PRICE, QUANTITY, PRODUCT, PURCHASE_PDTNUM, purchase_EAprice, purchase_company) VALUES ( p.standard, p.purchase_price, p.total_quantity, p.product, (SELECT MAX(purchase_pdtnum) FROM purchase_table), (SELECT purchase_EAprice FROM purchase_table WHERE purchase_pdtnum = (SELECT MAX(purchase_pdtnum) FROM purchase_table)), #{PurchaseCompany} )

UPDATE price_table pt SET pt.allpurchcnt = ( SELECT NVL(pt.allpurchcnt, 0) + NVL(purchase_price, 0) AS total_purch FROM purchase_table WHERE purchase_date = ( SELECT MAX(purchase_date) FROM purchase_table ) )
UPDATE price_table pt SET pt.allsellcnt = ( SELECT NVL(pt.allsellcnt, 0) + NVL(sell_price, 0) AS total_sell FROM sell_product WHERE sell_date = ( SELECT MAX(sell_date) FROM sell_product ) )

UPDATE price_table pt SET pt.REVENUE = COALESCE(pt.REVENUE, 0) + ( SELECT (sp.SELL_EAPRICE * sp.SELL_QUANTITY) - (st.PURCHASE_EAPRICE * sp.SELL_QUANTITY) FROM sell_product sp JOIN stock_table st ON sp.purchase_pdtnum = st.purchase_pdtnum WHERE sp.purchase_pdtnum = ( SELECT MAX(purchase_pdtnum) FROM sell_product ) AND sp.sell_date = ( SELECT MAX(sell_date) FROM sell_product WHERE purchase_pdtnum = ( SELECT MAX(purchase_pdtnum) FROM sell_product ) ) )

UPDATE stock_table SET QUANTITY = QUANTITY - ( SELECT SELL_QUANTITY FROM sell_product WHERE sell_date = ( SELECT MAX(sell_date) FROM sell_product ) ) WHERE stock_table.purchase_pdtnum = ( SELECT purchase_pdtnum FROM sell_product WHERE sell_date = ( SELECT MAX(sell_date) FROM sell_product ) )

UPDATE price_table pt SET pt.Stock_price = ( SELECT pt.Stock_price - NVL(SUM(sp.SELL_QUANTITY * st.purchase_eaprice), 0) FROM sell_product sp JOIN stock_table st ON sp.purchase_pdtnum = st.purchase_pdtnum WHERE sp.sell_date = ( SELECT MAX(sell_date) FROM sell_product WHERE purchase_pdtnum = sp.purchase_pdtnum GROUP BY purchase_pdtnum ) ) WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sell_product sp JOIN stock_table st ON sp.purchase_pdtnum = st.purchase_pdtnum WHERE sp.sell_date = ( SELECT MAX(sell_date) FROM sell_product WHERE purchase_pdtnum = sp.purchase_pdtnum GROUP BY purchase_pdtnum ) )

UPDATE price_table pt SET pt.stock_price = ( SELECT NVL(pt.stock_price, 0) + NVL(purchase_price, 0) AS total_stock_price FROM purchase_table WHERE purchase_date = ( SELECT MAX(purchase_date) FROM purchase_table ) )
UPDATE price_table pt SET pt.tax = ( SELECT NVL(pt.tax, 0) + NVL(tax, 0) AS total_tax FROM sell_product WHERE sell_date = ( SELECT MAX(sell_date) FROM sell_product ) )
